definitions.definition: An unsteady movement of the body in walking or standing as if one were about to fall; a reeling motion .
examples: the stagger of a drunken man

definitions.definition: ( veterinary medicine ) A disease of horses and other animals, attended by reeling, unsteady gait or sudden falling .
The spacing out of various actions over time.
( motor racing ) The difference in circumference between the left and right tires on a racing vehicle. It is used on oval tracks to make the car turn better in the corners.
( aviation ) The horizontal positioning of a biplane , triplane , or multiplane's wings in relation to one another.

main_definition: An unsteady movement of the body in walking or standing as if one were about to fall; a reeling motion .

definitions.definition: One who attends a stag night .

main_definition: ( UK ) One who attends a stag night .
